Title: Establishes the office of the deaf and hard of hearing; and repeals section 559 of the executive law relating to the New York state interagency coordinating council for services to persons who are deaf; repealer
Summary: Establishes the office of the deaf and hard of hearing, and the deaf and hard of hearing advisory council.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of the deaf and hard of hearing; and to repeal section 559 of the executive law relating to the New York state interagency coordinating council for services to persons who are deaf, deaf-blind, or hard of hearing
